scripts.pre-commit:install: cd apps/backend && pipenv run pre-commit install
scripts.pre-commit:run: cd apps/backend && pipenv run pre-commit run --all-files
scripts.pre-commit:run-changed: cd apps/backend && pipenv run pre-commit run
scripts.format:all: npm -w apps/frontend run format && cd apps/backend && pipenv run format
scripts.lint:all: npm -w apps/frontend run lint && cd apps/backend && pipenv run lint
scripts.type-check:all: npm -w apps/frontend run type-check && cd apps/backend && pipenv run type-check
